alignment Package¶

alignment Module¶

Sanger sequencing alignment tools.

class pymbt.alignment.alignment.Sanger(ref, res)[source]¶

Align and analyze Sanger sequencing results.

Parameters:
  • ref (str) – Reference sequence.
  • res (str) – Sequencing result string. A list of strings is also valid.
fix_disrepancy(result, position, newvalue)¶

Fix mismatch, deletion, or insertion manually.

plot()[source]¶

Plot visualization of results using matplotlib.

report()[source]¶

Report deletions, mismatches, and insertions.

write_alignment()[source]¶

Write alignment results to file - allows reanalysis and processing by other programs.

write_plot()[source]¶

Save plot to image (png or svg).

pymbt.alignment.alignment.readref(filepath, ftype='genbank')[source]¶

Read reference genbank file.

Parameters:
  • filepath (str) – Path to the file (typically genbank).
  • ftype (str) – Valid filetype readable by Bio.SeqIO.
pymbt.alignment.alignment.readres(dirpath)[source]¶

Read .seq results files from a dir.

Parameters:dirpath – Path to directory containing sequencing files.

needle Module¶

Needleman-Wunsch alignment using emboss needle.

pymbt.alignment.needle.needle(seq1, seq2)[source]¶

Do Needleman-Wunsch alignment.

Parameters:
  • seq1 (str) – First sequence.
  • seq2 (str) – Second sequence.
pymbt.alignment.needle.needleall(seq1, seq2s)[source]¶

Do Needleman-Wunsch alignment using EMBOSS NeedleAll.

Parameters:
  • seq1 (str) – First sequence.
  • seq2s (list) – List of second sequences to align with the seq1.
